Posts.EditableText: I've been playing adventures on quest for a while now and I've noticed that just about everyone has a little "avatar" when you click on there username. Even though it's just a square with a blocky pattern how do you get one?
Posts.HTML: I've been playing adventures on quest for a while now and I've noticed that just about everyone has a little "avatar" when you click on there username. Even though it's just a square with a blocky pattern how do you get one?

Posts.EditableText: Click on the 'User Control Panel' link at the top of the forum page, then chose profile and lastly 'Edit Avatar'.
Posts.HTML: Click on the 'User Control Panel' link at the top of the forum page, then chose profile and lastly 'Edit Avatar'.
